repositories.author: Xor-el
repositories.name: CryptoLib4Pascal
repositories.description: CryptoLib4Pascal is a Cryptographic Package for Delphi/FreePascal Compilers that provides at the moment support for creating, signing and verifying DSA, ECDSA, ECNR and ECSchnorr signatures using various curves and hashes, AES, Blowfish, Speck Encryption and Decryption (With various modes and paddings) and ECIES.

repositories.author: MerlijnWajer
repositories.name: Simba
repositories.description: Simba is a program used to repeat certain (complicated) tasks. Typically these tasks involve using the mouse and keyboard. Simba is programmable, which means you can design your own logic and steps that Simba will follow, based upon certain input such a colours on the screen.
